page.title: 08MY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: On a school day I get up at 8-00am.At 8-15am I have my breakfast of cereal and milk. At 8-25am I go to school. When I arrive I go straight inside. We start lessons at 9-00am. On a Monday we have music followed by topic work. At 10-15am we have prayers and then it is playtime.We have maths until noon. I have sandwiches,but could have a lunch.In the afternoon we have a spelling and tables test and then do our reference work. After the break we have games.At 3-30pm I go home.For tea I have meat and chips. I get ready for Brownies. At 6-00pm I set off. There is a "Bring and Buy Sale" tonight at 7-00pm. At 8-00pm I go home. When I reach home I have a bath and get changed ready for bed. I have my supper and then go upstairs to bed.
